name: msgraph-sample-github-graph-connector-typescript
title: Ingest GitHub repositories and issues using Node.js and TypeScript
shortDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest GitHub repositories and issues. The ingested content is set to be visible to everyone in the organization.
longDescription: This sample contains a Microsoft Graph connector that shows how to ingest GitHub repositories and issues. The ingested content is set to be visible to everyone in the organization.

thumbnails.alt: GitHub repositories displayed in Microsoft Search search results, visualized using a custom Adaptive Card
GitHub issues displayed in Microsoft Search search results, visualized using a custom Adaptive Card

references.name: Microsoft Graph connectors overview
references.description: Learn more what Microsoft Graph connectors are and when you'd use them.

references.name: Build your first custom Microsoft Graph connector
references.description: Learn how to build your first custom Microsoft Graph connector using .NET.
